docs.title: YouTube Transcript server
docs.text:
# To get the transcript of a YouTube video, run the following command:
uv run python scripts/youtube_transcript_server.py get-transcript-run \
    --video-id aKx5I0Mrr9g \
    --language en

# To run MCP server, run the following command:
uv run python scripts/youtube_transcript_server.py mcp-run --verbose

Run MCP Inspector for debugging:

uv run mcp dev scripts/youtube_transcript_server.py

docs.title: Inspector tool
docs.text:
See Tutorial > Inspector for more information.

# Run inspector tool directly
npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector

docs.title: Get started
docs.text:
• modelcontextprotocol/specification: The specification of the Model Context Protocol
  • MCP に入門する/ Introduction to MCP
  • mark3labs/mcp-go: A Go implementation of the Model Context Protocol (MCP), enabling seamless integration between LLM applications and external data sources and tools.
  • github/github-mcp-server: GitHub's official MCP Server
  • Go の Model Context Protocol (MCP)の開発フレームワーク mcp-go を使ってみる
  • modelcontextprotocol/inspector: Visual testing tool for MCP servers
  • Part1 : Azure AI Foundry で MCP を使ってみた【深掘りと最新動向調査】
  • Part2 : Azure AI Foundry で MCP を使ってみた【深掘りと最新動向調査】
